creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Watermark
Inscribed, upper left: [Le ciel une peu plus gris/ (??) le coup de (plaque?)] LR: [Bonne pour le Terrain]
markings: Watemark, centered in lowest edge of paper: [MBM]
signed: Signed in plate LL, and in pencil beneath plate LR
title: Les Petites Chaumières
